title: Money, Interest and Prices
content: May 19, 2016 4  Actual Price Movements in the Light of the   Preceding Theory  “The theory must … be regarded for the moment as a mere  hypothesis, the complete validity of which can be   established only by further resort to the facts of experience.  ……………  My purpose is to lay down the theoretical principles which   underlie these phenomena, and once they are correctly   understood their application can be confidently left to the   experience and insight of practical men” (pp. 176-7)
